settings.title: A better planet, one garden at a time

settings.text: It started with a simple vision. Save people money and save our planet with solar-powered products. Now, we support organisations leading the fight against rapid climate change, removing carbon from our atmosphere, planting trees in bushfire damaged Australia and promoting care across borders.

settings.title: Here are some organisations we support
1% For The Planet
settings.text: We are proud members of 1% For The Planet, and donate at least 1% of our annual revenue to environmental non-profits and organisations helping to reverse rapid climate change and preserve the magic of our little blue planet.

settings.title: One Tree Planted
settings.text: A portion of every sale goes to planting trees in areas affected by bushfires and deforestation in Australia with One Tree Planted. Our goal is to plant over 25,000 trees by the end of 2022, and every sale puts us closer to that goal of making a dent in rapid climate change.

settings.title: Planet by Shopify
settings.text: Free carbon-neutral delivery is included with every order placed through our store. A percentage of every sale also goes to supporting carbon removal projects through the Shopify Sustainability Fund to make a real impact on our Earth.

settings.title: The International Flag Of  Planet Earth
settings.text: The International Flag of Planet Earth Organisation (IFOPE-O) is a registered non-profit organisation. The IFOPE exists to remind the people of Earth that we share this planet, no matter of national boundaries; that we should take care of each other and the planet we live on. The team at SolaGarden believe in this mission too.

settings.title: Join over 15,000 Aussies and support our mission

settings.text: Every order placed supports organisations leading the fight against rapid climate change, helping preserve our home for generations to come. So save money and help save the planet with SolaGarden products.
